short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to support the Flooencer platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Flooencer Data Analytics extension is used to collect your content statistics so brands can understand the value of your personal brand.

This extension is required for a business influencer to register with the Flooencer platform. You need to have agreed to our [Terms of Service](https://www.flooencer.com/terms-of-service) prior to installing.

What is Flooencer?

Flooencer is a business influencer marketplace. It is used to connect with brand ambassadors, subject matter experts and thought leaders in business. Ranging from Sales Influencers, Marketing Influencers, Finance Influencers, Entrepreneurial Influencers and so many more. 

Why this extension is required?

We require all business influencers to use the Chrome Extension to be able to view your profile analytics. This is then processed to display their impressions, engagement rate and audience details. 

This is so that brands can select the best fit business influencers for them. 

What are we collecting?

- Number of Impressions
- Number of Engagements
- Average Impressions
- Average Engagements
- Profile Descriptors (Your Hashtags)
- Your Profile Details (Your Job Title, Where you work, Your Name)
- Top Posts
- Audience details (Seniority, Job Title, Companies, Locations, Industries, Company Sizes)

What rights do I have to my data?
You are able to review all the data we have collected and request removal at any point as Flooencer Limited is a UK based organisation and falls under GDPR regulations. You can view our [privacy policy here](https://www.flooencer.com/terms-of-service/privacy-policy).

Useful Links:
Website: Flooencer.com
LinkedIn Page: https://www.linkedin.com/company/flooencer/
The Business Influencer Marketing Blog: https://www.flooencer.com/business-influencer-blog
long.fr: A chrome extension to support the Flooencer platform
